import React from 'react' import style from './Users.module.css' import photoUser from '../../img/user.svg' import * as axios from 'axios' import {NavLink} from "react-router-dom"; const Users = (props) => { let pages = []; let pagesCount = Math.ceil(props.pageCount / props.pageSize); for (let i = 1; i < pagesCount; i++){ pages.push(i) } return
{ pages.map(p => props.pageEvent(p) } key={p}>{p}) }
{props.state.map(user =>
{user.name}
{user.status}
{"user.location.city"}
{"user.location.country"}
) }
} export default Users
